entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as eyeing Harry in surprise and having a conversation with him about Quidditch practice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being pleased about something and having a conversation with Ron about Quidditch practice.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as interrupting the conversation between Ron and Harry to receive the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as arriving in the form of a screech owl with the morning post.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry have a conversation about Quidditch practice.
Hermione receives the Daily Prophet from the screech owl.
